attributes.action: Make 12th July 2021 a bank holiday of England win the euros on the 11th
attributes.additional_details: National moment of joy and celebration if England win the Euros.
attributes.background: First time in history England could win the euros. Make the Monday a bank holiday.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Bank Holiday Monday if England get to the finals of the Euro’s 2020: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590584

Give the UK a Bank Holiday on Monday July 12th if England win Euro 2020: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590282
